participant_1.background:
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i never sleep in.

i paint organic scenes with pretty trees.

I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

content.text: Hey what's up, I'm a potter and I love photographing my everyday life. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I paint organic scenes with pretty trees. What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?

I love to spend time with my dogs and I also enjoy programming. I'm learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities. What do you like to do in your free time?

I have to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed. But I just bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner. I'm happy and healthy at my current weight, although I'm a little clumsy.
I'm so sorry to hear about your farm. I'm glad you're making the best of it! I think you sound like an amazing person. I'm sure you'll find a great partner soon.
Thank you! I appreciate that. I'm also glad to hear that you're happy and healthy. I'm sure you're going to do great things with your programming career!
Thanks! I'm excited to see where it takes me.
Me too! Let's stay in touch and see what happens!
